alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 12:16PM MST until November 16 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY ELEVATIONS ABOVE 4500 FEET IN THE CLARK FORK REGION... * WHAT...Snow expected for elevations above 4500 feet in the Clark Fork region, including Lookout Pass. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Lower Clark Fork Region. Lookout Pass. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Periods of moderate to heavy snow are expected at Lookout Pass during the late afternoon and evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
